Description.Name: Donegal Broadcasting Company
Description.Details: Gan Singh and Kelenfold raid update Recently, both Gan Singh and Kelenfold were raided, but the latest updates from the planets indicate that both raids were either repelled or contained, with no reported civilian losses. On [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_GanSingh],Gan Singh]], the Mariks, assuming that the planet was lightly defended, launched what they believed would be a brief probing raid. However, they were caught by local defenders under the able command of "Medal Excalibur" holder and Knight of Realm Andrew Redburn. The invasion force was decimated, resulting in a total failure for the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],FWL]].

Description.Name: Donegal Broadcasting Company
Description.Details: In [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Kelenfold],Kelenfold]], the situation was a bit more complex... [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKuritaDCMS],DCMS]] Tai-i Marge Sippers landed her forces on the night side of the planet, hundreds of kilometers away from their intended target, a Kelenfold TMM supply depot. This confusion about her true goal puzzled the defenders. When Sippers finally reached her target, her forces encountered opposition from a single lance of assault-class battlemechs from Kelenfold Tamar March Militia. Despite this, her force of rapid light mechs, consisting of Stingers and Jenners, managed to disable and destroy two of the heavier mechs, a Banshee and a Striker. They also succeeded in destroying the supply dump before being forced to withdraw by two remaining militia Zeus mechs. [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKuritaDCMS],DCMS raiders]] suffered loss of six of their light mechs, four Jenners and two Stingers. June 3042 Edition of DBC Monthly News Recap: Stay in the Know!
